subject: Affiliate Program
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Sean Bongcayao, and I’m a
passionate sim racing content creator with a growing audience on
YouTube, TikTok, etc. I’m reaching out because I admire Simsonn
commitment to offering high-quality, affordable sim racing products
that provide a compelling alternative to the more expensive mainstream
brands.
I’d love the opportunity to collaborate with you by testing and
reviewing some of your products, specifically those designed to
deliver great performance at a fraction of the cost of major brands.
 My goal is to showcase how your gear performs for budget-conscious
racers like myself and my audience, highlighting its value and quality
through detailed video reviews, written content, and social media posts.

In my detailed review of the Simsonn Haptic Vam Pro Linear Motor, I
compared it to DIY haptic solutions in my setup. Specifically, I evaluated
the Simsonn motor against a DIY setup using the Dayton Audio bass shaker
from Amazon. Given their similar price points, the Simsonn Haptic Vam Pro
offers superior performance and value, making the Dayton Audio option less
appealing.

I also wanted to try your high-end Simsonn pedals alongside my Fanatec V3
pedals to compare their performance. My goal was to demonstrate that more
expensive pedals aren’t always superior. By showcasing the Simsonn pedals,
I highlight their benefits and show that you don’t need to spend a fortune
to enjoy a high-quality sim racing experience.

*Comparison with Fanatec V3 Pedals:*
*Performance:* The Simsonn pedals deliver precise and responsive feedback,
rivaling the Fanatec V3 in terms of feel and control.
*Build Quality:* Both sets are well-constructed, but the Simsonn pedals
offer a sleek design with durable materials at a lower price point.
*Price:* The Simsonn pedals are significantly more affordable, making them
a compelling option for sim racers on a budget.

*Benefits of Simsonn Pedals:*
*Affordability:* High-quality performance at a fraction of the cost of
premium brands.
*Ease of Use:* Simple setup and compatibility with most sim racing rigs.
*Accessibility:* Ideal for beginners and enthusiasts looking to enter sim
racing without a large investment.
Conclusion

The Simsonn pedals prove that you don’t need to spend heavily to achieve a
competitive and immersive sim racing experience. Compared to the Fanatec
V3, they offer comparable performance and better value, making them an
excellent choice for cost-conscious racers.
I’m particularly interested in affordable options that compete with
bigger brands, as I believe my audience would benefit from discovering
cost-effective alternatives like yours.
Please let me know if you’re interested You can reach me at

seandom29@gmail.com
213-479-9985.

Thank you for your time and consideration—I’m excited about the
possibility of working together to bring your innovative products to
the sim racing community! You can check out my sim racing setup in the
YouTube link provided below. Thanks!

Best regards,
Sean Bongcayao
https://www.youtube.com/@Grail-05

I believe this content-driven approach, showcasing real-world comparisons,
will engage my audience and drive referrals to your products. Looking
forward to your thoughts and next steps.

Best regards,

Sean Bongcayao
